backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus OKLCH variable color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/CongratsPage.tsx: Page layout composing hero, highlights, aircraft photo, and footer inside ThemeShell.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution text and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Aircraf: Section displaying a styled Boeing 737 aircraft image with header and caption.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Responsive hero showing Vivan’s portrait, congratulatory text, and aircraft/airline stats.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Achievement cards triggering detailed congratulatory modals with aviation imagery.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseModal.ts: Reusable shadcn-based modal showing an image and message for highlight cards.
frontend/src/components/ThemeShell.tsx: Layout wrapper applying repeated airplane pattern background and theme styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and sets a custom orange‑red‑white theme with OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and feature definitions for building the themed congratulatory website.
